inputFieldTemplates.name: table-width-input
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineSelect(class(css-button table-width-button), option(null, Normal), option(table-wide, Wide), option(table-max, Max), option(table-100, 100%)):memory^width]

inputFieldTemplates.name: card-input
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineSelect(class(css-button card-button), option(null, Table), option(cards, Cards), option(cards cards-square, Square), option(cards cards-preview, Text)):memory^card]

buttonTemplates.label: -help
buttonTemplates.tooltip: Runs [command] -help in a new Terminal window
